rows.label: tlk45310341_06_msg0001
rows.name: Oh, what're we going to do about this?

rows.label: tlk45310341_06_msg0002
rows.name:
Well, you may not know this, but
Topprea Ore has suddenly become
extremely scarce of late.

rows.label: tlk45310341_06_msg0003
rows.name:
And a lack of supply means
the price jumps sky-high!

rows.label: tlk45310341_06_msg0004
rows.name:
Anyway, the problem is, with the
value riding so high, folk have started
excavating the stuff without a license.

rows.label: tlk45310341_06_msg0005
rows.name:
No matter how many warnings they're
given, they just come back for more
as soon as they see a chance.

rows.label: tlk45310341_06_msg0006
rows.name:
So Fons Maim have asked us to
tighten up security.

rows.label: tlk45310341_06_msg0007
rows.name:
The plan is to start regular patrols, but
we're not sure who to put on the job.

rows.label: tlk45310341_06_msg0008
rows.name:
Oh, you'll organize it for us?
That'd be a great help!

rows.label: tlk45310341_06_msg0009
rows.name:
With you taking care of this, that's
a real load off my mind! Thanks!
